item.description:
S.O.S - Steppin' On Saturday

The original "Chicago Style" Steppers of Boston invite you to the Steppers Set at Slade's from 4 PM - 8 PM.

Saturday August 21, 2010

Invited Guest - Friends 1V Life Boston http://www.friendsivl...

Special Guest - George

Pre Atlanta Kick Off

Invite your friends

Line Dancing

Steppin Birthday Dance July/Aug

Larry Ward

Kathleen Davis

Sharon Freeman-Kirnon

Jewell

Cynthia

Circle Time

Come get your Step On with new moves introduced by the recent Steady Steppers Work Shop

Bring your favorite CD

Cash bar...Good Food.... A GREAT TIME


RSVP now

www.steppersofboston.com

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: S.O.S - Steppin' On Saturday - Original Steppers of Boston Set @ Slade's 8/21
